channel.name: Datica OCI - HL7 RAS to JSON Transform

step.name: Create the JSON wrapper
MSH (Message Header) Segment
PID (Patient Identification), PD1 (Patient Demographic), NTE (Note), and AL1 (Allergy) Segments
--PV1 (Patient Visit) Segment - REQUIRES PID MAPPING STEP ABOVE
----PV2 (Additional Patient Visit Info) Segment - REQUIRES PV1 MAPPING STEP ABOVE
ORC (Common Order) Segment
--RXO (Pharmacy Presciption Order), RXR (Pharmacy Route), RXC (Pharmacy Component), and related NTE (Note) Segments - REQUIRES ORC MAPPING STEP ABOVE
--RXE (Pharmacy Encoded Order), RXR (Pharmacy Route), RXC (Pharmacy Component Order) Segments - REQUIRES ORC MAPPING STEP ABOVE
--RXA (Pharmacy Administration) Segment - REQUIRES ORC MAPPING STEP ABOVE
--RXR (Pharmacy Treatment Route) Segment - REQUIRES ORC MAPPING STEP ABOVE
--OBX (Observation), NTE (Notes) Segments - REQUIRES ORC MAPPING STEP ABOVE
--CTI (Clinical TrialIdentification) Segment - REQUIRES ORC MAPPING STEP ABOVE

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;

codeTemplateLibrary.name: Datica Mirth OCI Code Template Library
codeTemplateLibrary.description: This library contains code templates used by the Datica Mirth OCI channels

codeTemplate.name: Convert HL7 Date Format to ISO
Convert ISO Date Format to HL7
Get Segments After a Particular Segment
